review: Love the accessibility to various movies and music . It's a keeper!
author: Jo Stacy "Jojo"

review: Doesn't see all wifi channels available in home. Netflix stays blurring longer than when watching on smart TV. It is plugged in (to power outlet) so not as convenient as just having a stick plugged into TV.
author: eurony1

review: didn't think I had to pay for movie's, but I didn't research it as I should have, lots of free movies and Netflix, pictures great,

review: I use it all the time

review: Works as advertised and we really like it.
author: Kelly

review: Once I figured out what it could do, I am not tech savvy, love it love it.  I bought Sling and was able to watch Wimbledon and all the amazing programs offered by Amazon, particularly if you are a Prime Member.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it.  No streaming problems.  Still learning all the features.

review: This stick streams better than any device I have used before even my computer can not compare to this Amazon Fire Tv Stick love this Fire Tv Stick.. Get yours today and set movie night on fire!!★★★★★★💯👍🚜

review: Truly enjoying the fire stick much better than the chromecast!
